mapper.select: SELECT B.RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT LEVEL AS lv, C.* ,( SELECT ur_id FROM ANSWER_BOARD D WHERE D.as_no = C.as_prno )AS ASPRNO_ID FROM ANSWER_BOARD C WHERE br_no=#{brNo} AND as_en='Y' START WITH as_prno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR as_no=as_prno ORDER SIBLINGS BY as_no DESC, as_date DESC, as_update DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM <=#{cri.page}*#{cri.perPageNum})B WHERE B.RNUM >=#{cri.pageStart}
SELECT COUNT(br_No) FROM ANSWER_BOARD WHERE br_no=#{brNo} and as_en='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWER_BOARD SET as_content=#{asContent} ,as_update=SYSDATE WHERE AS_NO=#{asNo}
UPDATE ANSWER_BOARD SET AS_EN='N' WHERE AS_NO=#{asNo}
